amendment.description: To address the treatment of funds received by National Guard Bureau as reimbursement from States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3288 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3288 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 3748. To address the treatment of funds received by National Guard Bureau as reimbursement from States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3288 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3288 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
